content: By now this PR has grown a bit beyond its initial intentions. In particular it is no longer really about the fraction_map in the title.

Some of the proofs are quite ugly. But I don't really know how to make them nicer. For example: if I have a ring_equiv, show that it identifies the subsets of non_zero_divisors. This is once again one of those classical transfer problems. I don't want to go into that discussion again. But I do find it a bit unclean that my proof is >20 lines.
@Chris Hughes @Mario Carneiro I am happy to get feedback on this
@Kenny Lau Of course you are also very welcome to give feedback. (And sorry for mutilating your code beyond recognition.)
